casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Taufeeq, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Taufeeq (2002), 94 Ohio St.3d 501.]

(No. 01-1902 Submitted March 13, 2002 Decided April 3, 2002.) Donald W. White, Clermont County Prosecuting Attorney, Daniel J. Breyer and David H. Hoffmann, Assistant Prosecuting Attorneys, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings on the authority of State v. Murrell (2002), 94 Ohio St.3d 489, 764 N.E.2d 986, decided today.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., dissents. Pfeifer, J.,

dissents and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals. See his dissent in State v. Murrell (2002), 94 Ohio St.3d 489, 764 N.E.2d 986.
